Posts.Content: I was taken to the hospital. I started to have seizures, in and out of consiousness, vomiting, diareah. I couldn't speak, couldn't understand what others were saying, blurry vision. Memory loss, it took a few minutes to know who my husband was. My skin started to peel off, and finger nails were coming off. Couldn't stand, it felt like something was crawling thru my body. I thought I was going to die. My dr. gave me a break, and wanted to try again this time with half the dose. Heck NO! I refused Taxatere. Told her to order a PET Scan I was done with chemo, no more! The lump was no longer in breast. Took PET and it came back ALL clear. No signs of cancer. I still had surgery, lumpectomy, followed by radiation.
Posts.Title: allergic to taxotere

Posts.Content: Doctors. I hate looking at my calendar and seeing DR. APPT. I hate leaving the drs. and not feeling any better than before I went in, sometimes worse. And I have to give them $25 and the lady lets me know I have a balance. I have an appt. tomorrow and I'm dreading it.
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...

Posts.Content: I have 2 older sisters and like Kay couldn't have made it thru chemo without them. My sisters are a gift from God. They are my family, and my best friends.
Posts.Title: Sisters

Posts.Content: so true
Posts.Title: A quote I thought I would share

Posts.Content: You have been thru so much it's normal to cry, you have to get it out some how. I pray things will start to get better. I finished chemo on 3-17-10 I would be upset if I had to go back. The best to you and your family.
Posts.Title: back to chemo on Monday 5/10/10

Posts.Content: I had sores in my mouth, my gums around my teeth would bleed. The worse for me was my tongue was falling apart. I had holes in my tongue where chucks of tissue would fall out.Gross I know, but it all grew back. The inside of ones mouth repairs itself rather quickly.
Posts.Title: lips vibrating?

Posts.Content: I'm glad it's over. I lived to see the sun rise.
Posts.Title: May I ask you, how many chemo treatments did you have altogether?

Posts.Content: I had the same after chemo side effects. My legs hurt all the time. Then all my joint areas. I take omega fish oil and glucosamine chondroitin for joint health, joint lubricants. I also see a chiropractor which helps tremendously.
Posts.Title: Painful hips and legs at night?

Posts.Content: We all make the best decision that we can make based on the info. given to us. No one is 100% certain. There are no guarantees when dealing with cancer. The surgery is over, now you have to heal. Second guessing yourself will only bring fear. None of us need more of that. Take steps to do what you need to do. Live well Laugh often Love much
Posts.Title: Is there a chance of reoccurence after double mast.?

Posts.Content: My heart breaks for your wife, you, and the children. As I was praying this morning for your wife I realized I didn't know her name. What is your dear wifes name? Take care Jennifer
Posts.Title: DOES IT EVER STOP????

Posts.Content: I also had to read this twice. I heard myself saying no, no way!! Asking God isn't once enough for her or any of us to have to go thru this crap. Chen my heart goes out to you. You have been and are an inspiration to me and so many others. You will win, you have won. Thank God for Reggie, much love to you Reggie. Chen is getting bad news from the doc, and she feels bad for the doctor. Now that is a true sign of much love within the heart. Big hugs to you and Reggie Jennifer
Posts.Title: Just when I thought it was safe to go back in the water, I was bitten by Jaws! So to speak...

Posts.Content: I also had to read this twice. I heard myself saying no, no way!! Asking God isn't once enough for her or any of us to have to go thru this crap. Chen my heart goes out to you. You have been and are an inspiration to me and so many others. You will win, you have won. Thank God for Reggie, much love to you Reggie. Chen is getting bad news from the doc, and she feels bad for the doctor. Now that is a true sign of much love within the heart. Big hugs to you and Reggie Jennifer
Posts.Title: Just when I thought it was safe to go back in the water, I was bitten by Jaws! So to speak...

Posts.Content: Yes and a big worry lifted from your shoulders. Take care
Posts.Title: No Colon Cancer,Thank you Jesus

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear that your dad passed away. Hang in there take care of yourself while you finish your treatments. I won't say anything ugly about your husband I'll just say the best to you. 1 big hug 2 u Jennifer
Posts.Title: Lost my Dad June 21st

Posts.Content: I also had to read this twice. I heard myself saying no, no way!! Asking God isn't once enough for her or any of us to have to go thru this crap. Chen my heart goes out to you. You have been and are an inspiration to me and so many others. You will win, you have won. Thank God for Reggie, much love to you Reggie. Posts.Title: Just when I thought it was safe to go back in the water, I was bitten by Jaws! So to speak...

Posts.Content: Wishing you tons of luck to be painfree. Hope all goes well and you are up and moving in no time.
Posts.Title: Update BJmom

Posts.Content: and night sweats are miserable. How do you know if it's temp. or perm.?
Posts.Title: Am I in menopause? 29 years old on Cytoxan.

Posts.Content: I have been thinking of you. Sorry to hear the bad news. Praying for you, and your family. No one should have to endure what you are facing. My heart hurts for you, take care our dear friend Barbara. Jennifer
Posts.Title: Update on Bjmom1

Posts.Content: I'm so so sorry you had to go thru that. Reading what you went thru makes my heart hurt for you. See another doctor, someone you feel comfortable with. Please please please don't end your life, that isn't the answer. Keep us updated on your progress.
Posts.Title: this is SO not what I was told...

Posts.Content: Love to hear "all is clear." In 6 months will hear the same news.
Posts.Title: And the News Just Gets Better

Posts.Content: Sorry to hear all the bad news. Sorry to hear about your friend, I know it hurts real bad. You keep fighting as I know you will. Take care. Jennifer
Posts.Title: update on BJMOM

Posts.Content: In fact it ALL sucks, but that is what we have to do to get better. I remember when you first posted, now you are almost done with chemo. Hang in there. Hoorah for dad, and Tim. Go topless if you want whatever is comfortable for you. Comfy is above appearance at this point.
Posts.Title: ughh Chemo #5 and I'm sick!

Posts.Content: All the destruction. I went thru Hurricane Katrina, I live on the MS.gulf coast, east of Biloxi. Loosing material possessions is bad, but doesn't compare to loosing a loved one. Things can be replaced, what matters most are the people.
Posts.Title: OT Please say a prayer for all those suffering from the swollen Mississippi River

Posts.Content: Jojo I am so sorry. I hope the police find out what happened. Hugs to all the family.
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: Jojo I am so sorry. I hope the police find out what happened. Hugs to all the family.
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!
